name: A long winter
description:
A Long Winter is a resource management survival game with randomized events.

Each day a new event Will happen, and it Will be narrated to you on the scroll on the left.

Once you have read the event you need to assess which hero possessess the stats to give you the upper chance once the dice rolls.

This game was made in 48 hours to submit on the GMTK gamejam 2022.
